description: From the collection inspired by the spectacular freeski film “La Liste” featuring MAMMUT Pro Team Athlete Jérémie Heitz. The La Liste Hardshell Pants are robust ski pants made from lightweight and very comfortable 3-layer Gore-Tex® C-Knit material. Completely waterproof, outstanding breathability. These pants with a casual freeride look impress with a wide range of practical features: key clip, side ventilation, cozy neoprene pocket for a cellphone and much more.
name: Mammut La Liste HS Pants, Reg - Mens
